1.content:
A canister of toxic waste had accidentally been left behind from a delivery truck near a dairy farm near Beachton, Georgia, several miles north of the Florida state line. The toxic waste was spilled into the ground water and made its way into the soil, where a herd of cows were roaming around.

One cow in particular started chewing on grass and drinking water from a small puddle, which became contaminated. Unknown to the dairy farmer, the cow became infected and the chemicals penetrated the cow’s system. Luckily, the cow still produced milk, which was deemed to be of good quality. After having gone through all the tests and filters, this milk was distilled and packed at the distribution center before it was shipped by truck to Atlanta.

From there, the tainted milk was shipped out to grocery stores, schools, or restaurants, to be purchased, distributed, or consumed.

We’re not going to bother too much about where the milk goes (eg. What city, what country), but more who ends up getting the tainted milk?

111.content:
"He's not your real brother," Ashley tossed back her perfect, blond curls with a sneer, "He's adopted."

Owen crossed his arms over his chest and rolled his eyes.

"I'm adopted too, Ashbin," Owen snapped, "Remember?"

He dropped his arms and slipped onto his bike. Ignoring Ashley's smoldering eyes, he peddled toward the front of the school to meet with his eight-year-old brother, Andrew. The younger boy was waiting, helmet in-hand, as Owen skid to a stop.

"Ready to party, Andy?" Owen grinned.

Andrew frowned and fumbled with the snap on his helmet. Owen shifted his eyes to the trees that stretched over Maple Elementary, resisting the urge to help. He'd learned long ago that Andrew was determined to do anything and everything that he could without assistance. Missing his right arm wasn't going to keep his little brother from being independent.

"I don't know..." Andrew sighed as the helmet finally cooperated and snapped into place, "I already have one annoying big brother. I don't know how I'm gonna handle two of you."

"Hardy, har, har," Owen smirked, "Saddle up and let's go. Mom'll freak if we're late to the welcoming party."

Owen gave Andrew a thirty-second head start, just like he did every school day. As he took off after Andrew he wondered if their new brother would enjoy the same game.

Owen grinned as Andrew glanced over his shoulder and saw him coming. He watched as Andrew's legs pumped faster in an attempt to stay in the lead. Owen laughed and leaned over his handlebars. Within seconds he was ahead of Andrew and moments later, he was braking in front of their garage.

"I'll get you next time!" Andrew panted as he pulled into the driveway.

"In your dreams!" Owen taunted, sticking out his tongue.

Andrew giggled, dropped his bike, and ran for the front door.

"Not cool, Andy!" Owen yelled.With a sigh he bent to pick up his brother's bike and park it in the garage.

Pushing open the front door, Owen was greeted with a giant Welcome! sign. Helium balloons of every color were tied to all the chairs, and Andrew sat munching a chocolate cupcake on the couch.

"I think we're supposed to wait for the guests to arrive before eating those." Owen warned his brother. Andrew ignored him and took another bite. Crumbs tumbled from his lips and chocolate frosting smeared across his nose.

Owen shrugged, "It's your funeral. And make no mistake," he thumped a blue balloon floating near his head, "Mom will kill you if you mess up this party by eating all the food..."

"She won't miss one out of a million." Andrew scoffed. At this, Owen had to agree. Their mom had gone a bit overboard with the cupcakes.

"I don't know what his favorite flavor is," she'd nervously laughed that morning before school, "so I made a dozen of every kind."

Owen picked up a lemon cupcake and tore off the paper wrapper.

"She probably wouldn't miss two, then, either." He ate half of the treat in one bite and was just about to polish off the rest when there was a knock at the door.

Stuffing the rest of the cupcake behind the foyer's only potted plant, he reached for the doorknob.

"Go wash up!" Owen hissed. The doorbell rang again as Andrew ran for the bathroom.

"This is just so excitin'!" a voice gushed as Owen threw open the front door. Smiling politely, Owen stepped aside so Uncle Richard and Aunt Marjorie could enter.

"Why," Aunt Marjorie continued, "I think there's more hullabaloo over your new brother joinin' the family than when you were adopted, Owen, dear."

Uncle Richard sighed and shared a look with Owen over Aunt Marjorie's head.

"Oooh, cupcakes!" Marjorie squealed. "That reminds me," she said as she licked raspberry frosting off her thumb, "I bought a jug of milk from Thriftgreens for the party. You can't have cake without milk, dear."

"But..."

"I got it on sale," Marjorie hissed in Owen's ear, "but don't tell your mama. She'll think I'm cheap."

Uncle Richard coughed and Aunt Marjorie glared at him.

"But..." Owen tried again.

"Be a good boy and get it from my car." Marjorie interrupted, handing him her keys.

"Yes, ma'am."

Owen stepped outside before slapping his forehead in frustration.

"But mama is lactose intolerant, he mumbled to himself.

On his way back to the house, milk jug in-hand, several more relatives showed up. Owen let them inside, stored the milk in the fridge, and watched the time slowly slip by.

"When's your mama going to get here?" Aunt Marjorie whined

"Should be soon, Auntie." Owen murmured. He crammed his clammy hands into his jean pockets. As the minutes crept by, he found he was becoming more and more anxious about meeting his new brother.

"Why, Owen, dear! You look positively green around the gills!" Aunt Marjorie gushed. She clucked her tongue in sympathy and reached for the fridge handle.

"I know what'll help, dear. A nice, warm glass of milk."

"I don't know..." Owen started to protest. Aunt Marjorie ignored him and opened a cupboard.

"Hm," she grunted, "Well, I have no idea where your mama keeps her pans--"

"They're next to the--"

"--so I'll just pour you a nice, cold cup. It'll be just as good." Marjorie insisted.

"--stove." Owen muttered.

Andrew burst into the kitchen as Aunt Marjorie poured the milk into a glass.

"He's here! He's here!" Andrew yelled.

"I'll just grab a cup of milk for him, too." Marjorie smiled. "Don't forget yours, Andrew, dear."

Andrew snatched the glass, spilling half its contents on the kitchen floor before tearing off to greet their new brother.

"Oh, my!" Marjorie gushed. Her hands fluttered like frightened birds.

Owen groaned. "I've got it, Auntie." He grabbed a roll of paper towels and started mopping up the mess.

He was on his knees when he bumped into a pair of brown loafers. Glancing up, he met the amused eyes of a boy.

"Liam?" Owen questioned.

The boy grinned, his teeth bright against the backdrop of his beautiful, dark skin.

"I am here at last, brother." Liam said with a nod.

Andrew bounced to their sides, cup sloshing, as Owen stood. He noted that, at ten-years-old, he wasn't much taller than nine-year-old Liam.

"Is that milk?" Liam asked.

Andrew looked into his near-empty cup and nodded.

"Well, then," Liam flashed another contagious grin," "let us all have a glass and toast to our new brotherhood."

Owen picked up his cup of milk and Liam took a full glass from an unusually silent Aunt Marjorie.

"To brothers!" Liam toasted.

"To brothers!" Owen and Andrew repeated.

The three boys clinked glasses, brought the cups to their lips, and drank.

112.content:
“Boys! Please come help carry the groceries out of the car! Cory! Jake! Henry!” Sandra shouted, as she walked into the kitchen from the garage door, carrying a bag of groceries in her arm with her handbag and keys in the other hand.

“Coming, mom!” Cory shouted, as he raced through the door. Cory was the oldest, at 11, and he was always hungry, which was normal for a growing pre-teen boy. Cory had blond curly hair and blue eyes and he was the tallest guy in the house, since Sandra was a single mom and divorced.

Jake was 8 years old, and was the one in the middle, just in 2nd grade. He had black hair and blue eyes.

Henry was the smallest and the youngest, at only 5 years old. He was only one with blond hair.

Jake quickly ran after Cory, since his job was to imitate everything that the older brother did. Everywhere Cory went, Jake followed. Jake totally looked up to Cory and did everything possible to be like his older brother.

Henry, on the other hand, really didn’t care about anything else but to play with his toys and to watch cartoons on TV. Henry just wanted to play and have fun and he just was the ray of sunshine in the family. Cory and Jake would go off and do their sports events together, but Henry was always the little brother who was left all alone, so he usually spent the most time with Sandra.

“Did you get any Pop-Tarts, mom?” Cory asked, as he walked in the door carrying two bags of groceries in his thin, long arms.

“Yeah, and any candy?” Jake asked in choir.

“No, no sweets this time, dear! You need to learn to eat more healthy stuff! You need to eat veggies!” Sandra said, as she started unpacking the groceries.

“Ooohhh mom! You didn’t buy any soda!” Jake groaned.

“No, Jake! No soda for you! You’re gaining weight! I got a whole gallon of milk for you guys!” Sandra replied.

“Hehe! I can get soda from the vending machine at school!” Cory grinned.

“No soda? Awwwww mommm!!!!” Jake whined. “I hate milk!”

“Quit your whining! You need to drink more milk, young man!” Sandra said angrily. “Now, help but everything away before we have dinner!”

The boys helped put everything away before Sandra started to prepare a delicious meal for the four of them. Afterwards, they would watch TV together. During the meal everyone would drink water, and they would all forget about the milk. Later on, someone would remember about the milk, but who?

1122.content:
Jake snuck into the kitchen while his mom and brothers relaxed on the couch with a movie. Mom had brought out a plate of baby carrots and celery but Jake had refused the snack.

"I'm not a rabbit, mom," he'd whined.

"Suit yourself," Mom had grinned. Wiggling her nose like a bunny, she crunched a bite of carrot and passed the plate to Corey.

Jake glanced over his shoulder to make sure the coast was clear. He could hear Henry laughing at the show in the other room. Crouching down, Jake opened the bottom cupboard near the stove. Reaching in a hand he pushed past a box of cereal and a package of noodles.

"Where are you?" he whispered. His fingers felt along the back off the cupboard until he felt the familiar package. He pulled out the bar of chocolate and grinned.

"I knew this stash would come in handy!" he chuckled. With another furtive glance toward the living room, he ripped the wrapper off the chocolate and took a bite.

The candy bar didn't last long. Jake tossed the wrapper in the garbage and wiped the chocolate off his lips. Thirsty, he grabbed a glass from the dishwasher and yanked the jug of milk from the fridge.

"Ug! This milk is heavy!" Jake grunted.

"Watcha doin'?" a voice at his elbow asked. Startled, Jake jerked and lost hold of the milk jug. The container hit the floor and the white liquid exploded across the linoleum.

Jake planted his hands on his hips and glared at Henry.

"Why'd you sneak up on me like that?!" Jake shouted. "You made me spill the milk!"

"Aw, I didn't mean to, Jake." Henry pouted.

"Yeah, well, now whose gonna clean up the mess? If mom sees this she's gonna be mad!" Jake complained.

Henry's eyes lit up. "I know! We'll let Boomer lick it up! He'll have it cleaned up real fast!"

Jake leaned over and tousled Henry's blond hair.

"That's a good idea, Henry. Go get Boomer."

11222.content:
Henry carried the calico cat just underneath it's front legs, with it's stomach facing forward. The cat was barely more than a kitten, and they had it since it was a little baby. The cat took no time before he started work cleaning the kitchen.

"Hurry up, Boomer!" Henry whispered, so as to not call attention to the kitchen.

It seemed to the boys like forever, but the feline soon had the milk all lapped up.

Henry took the cat back to where he was sleeping before the incident while Jake put the empty milk carton in the recycling bin.

The next morning, Cory filled the cat's food dish. He watched as the cat walked in, but was so surprised with the cat's size that he immediately ran out of the room and to his mother, who had not yet gone to work.

"Mom, what happened to the cat?" Cory asked.

"What do you mean?" Sandra asked.

"I'll show you."

Cory lead his mom into the kitchen and showed her the cat.

The cat had previously been quite average, but now Boomer was almost two feet tall to the shoulders, his legs were as thick as Cory's middle finger was long, and he was about three feet long. Boomer's tail was even more impressive, at around two feet long. It wasn't just the size that changed. The cat only grew larger to accommodate for the extreme new muscles he was sporting.

"Boys! Come here!" Sandra called through the house.

Jake and Henry ran to their mother to see what she wanted. Jake arrived just a few seconds before his younger brother, since his legs were longer. Both boys stared at the cat for the few seconds before their mother addressed them.

"Jake, Henry," she asked, "Do you know anything about this?"

"Maybe he had too much milk," Henry suggested before he remembered that his brother's milk mistake was a secret. Jake glared at Henry.

"What milk?" Sandra asked her boys.

"The milk that Jake spilled," Henry said honestly.

"You spilled my milk?!" Sandra asked, her focus now turned to Jack.

"It was an accident! I promise!" Jake told his mom quickly.

11333.content:
It came as a big surprise when little Peter and his mom suddenly felt a change within themselves. Neither knew what was happening but for some reason they began growing!

Peter was still a small boy because of his age and therefore had a scrawny build while being 4'6 tall. The young boy was confused and shocked when he started getting taller than he already was. Before he knew it he was almost 5' tall, taller than a kid of his age should be. Peter looked down at his body, he felt hot and some sort of pain was coursing through him. He shut his eyes and groaned slightly as he felt his limbs thickening. His petite arms packed on some healthy amount of muscle while his legs became bigger. His calves expanded as well, creating a nice bulge of muscle. His torso broadened with enlarged pecs that had some nice definition. A sixpack formed on his tummy and lats expanded at the same time. When the change was over, Peter had grown quite the amount, sporting muscles that were around the size of those of his eldest brother but looked firmer and stronger. He had somehow overcome his small size that was to blame on his premature birth and grown past what a boy of his age normally achieved.

But he wasn't the only growing though.

Anna knew she wasn't really in shape anymore. Being a single mother of three kids did that to you. She was still considered to be good looking but she was chubby and disappointed with her physique. But now that changed. She had grown to 5'10, taller than she normally was. Her body fat had dissipated and was now replaced by some impressive muscles. Her biceps were round, her thighs thick with long legs, her calves bulged with muscle, her chest was strong and broad, she had an impressive sixpack and even her butt had become bigger and firmer thanks to her expanded glutes.

"Mom, what happened to us?" Peter asked in wonder.

"I don't know honey." Anna replied as she ran a hand over her abs. "It looks like the milk did this."

"Well it's awesome!" Peter cheered and flexed his arm.

A nice ball of muscle tensed at his command, there was even a small vein that ran across the top. Peter was completely enamored with his new body. The muscles felt great and better than what he previously had. The bullies wouldn't be toying with him now anymore.

"I'm not so sure about this." His mom said, she was somewhat worried by the changes.

"Hey mom, your arm is even bigger than mine!" Peter suddenly pointed out.

Anna was startled for a moment and looked at her right arm. Now that he mentioned it, she did have an impressive bicep. Anna flexed it tentatively and was surprised by how round, big and firm it was. Her bicep wasn't bodybuilder size but she did have one that looked as if she spent days in the gym. The single mother examined herself some more and as time passed on she actually began to like the new her.

"Well, I guess drinking that milk isn't so bad after all." She commented with a smile. "How about we try lifting those groceries?"

"Sure thing mom!" Peter said enthusiastically.

The 6 years old boy walked over to one bag which was filled with wraps of toilet paper and some vegetables. He reached out and grabbed the bag before lifting it up. Peter grinned broadly when he saw that he could lift it with one arm and didn't even tire that much. Before the change he couldn't even properly lift it from the ground.

"Wow, look at me mom! I'm actually doing it!" Peter laughed.

"That's great honey." Anna said with a slight smile.

The single mother then walked over to the other bags. These were filled with meat, cleaning tools and many other things. She remembered having to drag them one by one out of the car and into the garage since they were so heavy. Glancing at her enlarged arms, she decided to try it out. Anna grabbed each bag before lifting them up with her new might. Much to her surprise, and delight, she discovered that they didn't feel that heavy anymore. In fact they actually felt rather light to her. The mother could easily bring the bags to eye level without any difficulty and it excited her.

"Now let's put them in the kitchen dear." She called out to her little son.

"Alright mom." Peter replied.

As they walked through the house they felt more confident and a lot stronger. Peter was very impressive considering his age. His considerable calves on his short legs flexed with every step and his enlarged pecs were straining against his tight spiderman shirt. Anna on the other hand was walking with tight leggings that showed off her enticing big thighs while her arms tensed, her biceps showing off along with small veins, as she carried her groceries.

Once they were inside they put away the groceries and thought about what to do next.

113332.content:
Ryan sighed as he read another comic of his, another superhero comic. He wouldn’t admit it out loud but he sometimes wished to be like the heroes in the comics. To be strong and athletic. He himself wasn’t any of the two, just skinny without any real sense for sports. His older brother Sam on the other hand was the opposite of him, athletic with a healthy amount of muscle on his young frame. But Ryan? No, he certainly didn’t get to be like that which was the reason why he was envious of Sam.

Sam was also rather confident which combined with being the eldest of the three brothers made him somewhat cocky. Ryan wouldn’t say that Sam was outright arrogant but the older boy could certainly use some humiliation. It didn’t help that Sam wanted to get even bigger so he could be the best on the wrestling team. Ryan preferred his comics, thank you very much.

Ryan was about to turn around the page of his comic when he suddenly heart a faint noise. Frowning in confusion, Ryan put down the superhero comic and focused on the sound. It was coming from the hedgerow that separated his backyard with that of Erica’s home. The teenage girl was someone he had a crush on. In fact, Ryan was always ecstatic when Erica came over to babysit him and the others. The only one who knew of this was Sam who often teased him about it, saying that he was too young and too plain for her. Those words always made Ryan mad and for just once he wished he could show his brother who was the boss. But he wasn’t going to imagine things, he knew Sam would always be the physically superior one of the two.

He moved closer to the hedgerow and found his usual sneaky hole. It was where the plants had parted, allowing him to look through a tiny hole. Ryan got closer before trying to get a glimpse of what was on the other side. The nine years old boy’s heart fluttered when he saw Erica sitting in a chair in her backyard. No matter how many times he saw her, he would always be mesmerized by her beauty. Erica was a pretty girl of average height with long blonde hair that framed her face, going well together with her blue eyes that seemed to sparkle. She had a curvaceous figure but Ryan paid more attention to those gorgeous eyes and her kind personality.

“Yes, Stacy.” Ryan heard her say to someone on her phone. “Brad’s abs do look nice, but have you seen Tom’s biceps? They’re so round and firm! You know I’m a sucker when it comes to handsome guys with nice muscles. I mean, I’m not picky but skinny guys just aren’t my type.”

Those words cut deep into Ryan’s heart. He somewhere knew that it was a childish crush, one that would fade, in the deepest corners of his mind. However, it didn’t mean he didn’t feel anything for the blonde. Ryan felt his eyes sting and with a dejected posture left his hiding place. He didn’t even pick up his discarded comic book. Instead, he simply moved back inside of the house.

If only he was bigger. Maybe Erica would like him more if he gained some muscles to show off. Ryan stared at his twig-like arms and sighed, there was no way he’d get muscular. Sports just weren’t something that he was good at. Ask him who spider-man’s archenemy was and he could answer a few, but being athletic was not his forte.

Ryan shook away those thoughts and walked into the kitchen. He saw some groceries lying around so mom was back already, even though he hadn’t seen her yet. He was about to move but then spotted milk on the counter. Ryan liked milk a lot and maybe it would cheer him up a bit. With a slight smile he walked over to the drink, poured himself a glass and drank it. A satisfied sigh escaped his mouth when it was empty, a burp following soon after. But then a strange feeling seeped in his body.

The young boy groaned as he felt his body change, every muscle fiber expanding. Ryan looked through half-closed eyes as his forearms began to thicken while his biceps swelled. Small veins were spreading all over the two limbs as they looked more akin to a 16 years old boy’s developed arms. His sleeves couldn’t keep up with the expanding arms and slowly tore apart to make room. His legs also grew, quads pulsing as they grew bigger by the second. His long sock were stretched to the fullest by the exploding growth of his calves that bulged to form a teardrop shape. Ryan’s legs were something that only someone like an exercised soccer player could achieve. His baggy shorts barely made room for his enlarged limbs.

The shirt was even stretched further as his pecs inflated, now two slabs of brawny muscle. His stomach tightened as it developed killer abs that every teen would be jealous of. They were hard, cut and shredded beyond the level that someone of his age could naturally achieve. His shoulders widened as well while his neck became thicker and thicker, veins running all over his muscles. Even his back was shredded now as every part of him accommodated to contain all of that muscle mass. He even grew somewhat, now at the same height as his older brother but certainly bigger.

“Wow!” Ryan cheered as he inspected himself.

The kid flexed his muscles, excited by the sheer size of them. A hand latched onto his left bicep as he felt it up. Ryan could feel how hard it was and also the small veins that ran across the muscular limb. Not even his brother had such biceps! They were very large in size and on his young frame they looked even more ridiculous.

“This is awesome.” Ryan said to no one in particular. “I’m much bigger than Sam. Maybe Erica will like me now!”

In all of his excited state he had already forgotten about the cause of his growth, namely the milk. Instead he began thinking about what he should do with these new muscles.

He could pay Sam a visit upstairs. Ryan looked forward to showing who was the biggest in the house now. Maybe he’d even wrestle Sam…

Or he could go see Erica. The older girl couldn’t ignore him now, not after his spectacular growth. Maybe he’d even get a kiss from her…

Ryan took one last look at his new muscles. They bulged and flexed nicely with every move, hard and strong. There was no denying how impressive his muscles looked. As he flexed his biceps one more time he made up his decision.
113332.title: They walk away and leave the milk alone

choices: Sam discovers the milk
Someone walks in on them
1133322.content:
Ryan was a lot more confident now. His new muscles gave him the feeling that he was much better now, a sense of strength. He was going to test out his newfound strength and show Sam that he wasn't the little runt anymore. His biceps were bigger than Sam's, much more defined too.

The young boy walked up the stairs as he headed towards his older brother's room. Sam was still at home, doing some homework at the last minute. Their mother was strict about that and he had already done his. Ryan chuckled at that. He was smarter than his brother, that was for sure, but now bigger and stronger as well. With that in mind he walked through the hallway and stopped at his brother's door.

Sam was bored out of his mind as he did his homework. Math wasn't his forte, he'd rather be exercising at the moment. He fantasized about getting more muscular so he'd fit better in the team. However, he was shaken out of his thoughts when his door opened. For a second he thought it was his mom to bring in his clothes but he was surprised to see his younger brother Ryan standing there.

He also felt his jaw drop at the sight of his brother's muscles. He didn't remember his smaller and less athletic brother being this big.

"Ryan? What happened to you?!" Sam exclaimed in shock, almost falling out of his chair.

"I decided to bulk up." Ryan replied with a grin and brought up his left arm before flexing it. "Impressive, right? I've gotten really big."

Sam stared wide-eyed at Ryan's big bicep. Even he didn't have such big arms so why did his little brother all of the sudden? That bicep was defined and he could see it bulge every single time Ryan flexed it.

"But how?" Sam further asked, curious if maybe he could try the same thing that Ryan did.

Ryan smirked, "That's a secret. I just came here to show you how much bigger I am than you now."

Sam felt indignant at how Ryan said he was bigger. He had to admit that Ryan's muscles looked formidable, especially because his younger brother was not in his puberty yet, but that didn't mean he was stronger or anything. No, he would show his little brother who was the biggest in the house.

"You take that back!" He yelled in an annoyed tone. "There's no way you're better than me. I bet those muscles are just for show."

"Oh, really? Well, how about a contest?" Ryan responded as he stood his ground. "We'll armwrestle and see who's stronger."

"Fine." Sam growled. "Downstairs in the living room."

The two boys left the room and went down the staircase to start their match. Sam had to admit that Ryan's muscles were impressive. He could see how those calves and legs flexed as they descended the staircase. They walked over to the dining table in the living room as they prepared themselves for their little competition.

Sam frowned as Ryan placed his arm on the table and held his hand out. Ryan smiled smugly at him, knowing that his bicep was bulging in this position and that it intimidated his older brother.

"You're not chickening out, are you?" Ryan said teasingly.

His older brother huffed in response and put down his own arm. He grasped Ryan's hand with his own, now ready to begin their armwrestling competition. Sam noticed that his brother's grip was much stronger than before and it slightly discouraged him. However, his pride as the eldest and strongest was on the line. He was going to defeat his brother right here and right now.

"Ready?" He asked.

"Yup." Ryan replied, feeling confident in his chances.

"Three, two, one, go!"

Sam immediately went on the offensive, pushing against his brother's hand that seemed to budge slightly but otherwise remained still. He tried to push harder but aside from making his opponent's arm shake he didn't manage to gain any ground. This shocked Sam which didn't go unnoticed.

Ryan was grinning and enjoying himself. It was awesome to see just how strong he was. Even though Sam was clearly using all of his strength he was failing to even make progress. Ryan looked down at his bicep and saw it bulge nicely, flexing hard and veins pulsing. He loved being big, loved seeing how his older brother struggled against his strength.

"What's the matter? Getting tired." Ryan said with a wide smile, spotting sweat drops on Sam's face.

"Shut up!" Sam spat and used even more force.

Ryan rolled his eyes, definitely feeling his arm being pushed back so he decided to use his own power. He growled as he used even more strength yet took his time to humiliate Sam. Slowly but steadily he brought his brother's arm down, not giving any mercy. His bicep flexed even more before he finally took down his brother. He'd officially claimed the title of strongest in the house.

Ryan cheered and stood up, flexing both arms to the max.

"I won! I'm the strongest now!" Ryan laughed as his sleeves ripped a bit.

Sam stared bitterly at his younger brother's muscles, especially those big biceps of his. He was envious of those muscles. Maybe he'd find out how Ryan got so big in the first place...
1133322.title: Ryan visits his older brother Sam

choices: Sam has to be punished for his bad behavior as of late
Rachel allows him to have some milk
Other choices
11333221.content:
"No fair!" Sam yelled in denial, slamming his hand on the table. The eldest wasn't happy with his loss, "How did you get so big anyway?"

Ryan shrugged his somewhat wider shoulders, "It's a secret. Besides, why should I tell someone who is weaker than me?"

This angered Sam, who was used to being the strongest. He often used that to his advantage. Peter was too small to do anything, but he could always count on Ryan to do stuff for him, given the proper motivation; usually bullying.

He would often wrestle with the younger boy, but now he wasn't so sure about his chances anymore. The humiliation of losing the arm-wrestling contest still stung. Sam wasn't used to having his pride trampled on like that.

However, he was sure that Ryan had grown somehow, and he was more than motivated to find out how.

"You're not stronger than I am! Don't forget; I'm the man of the house." He pointed a finger at himself, puffing up his averagely-muscled chest.

"Oh, really?" His younger brother smirked, crossing well-defined arms over noticeable pectorals. Said blocky muscles were visible through the boy's tight shirt, "Then how did I beat you? I'll tell you why; it's because I am now the strongest, and you're just jealous."

Sam sneered, "Only because you're cheating. You can't get muscles like that. Who knows? Maybe they're just fake."

That seemed to strike a sensitive chord in his brother, whose smile vanished and was replaced instead by an indignant frown. Typical of his brother. There were many ways to annoy Ryan, and he knew them all.

"Hey, these muscles are real!" The younger boy objected.

"You're obviously lying, if you can't even explain how you got them." He shot his brother a condescending look, mixed with a hint of smugness to rile him up, "Admit it; you're just a cheat."

"I am not a cheat! I got these muscles after I drank the milk and--"

Ryan's mouth snapped shut, but the damage had already been done, as Sam's eyes widened in surprise. His brother had grown those muscles because of some milk? Well, not just some milk, if it truly granted the impressive physique.

He'd never heard of such a thing. Being a fan of sports and interested in working out, he'd looked up muscles before on the internet, which had led to him discovering fantasy works about the subject. To be honest, the muscle milk sounded like a fantasy tale too.

But it wasn't. Sam knew his younger brother hadn't had big muscles like that earlier this day, so the muscle milk had to be real!

And he had to get some himself.

"Wait, Sam!"

He ignored his brother's command, and dashed off towards the kitchen. When he arrived, Sam immediately looked around for the milk. The groceries that had been brought back from the store weren't lying on the table anymore, meaning his mom had put them away already.

Luckily for him, however, there was still a carton left on the table.

Sam smiled cockily as he walked over to the table. Now that he had some of the muscle milk himself, he would drink it all and grow big muscles like those people on TV, and when he did, he would show Ryan who the real man in the house was.

Confident and certain of his victory, the eldest son grabbed the carton and raised it to his lips. The sweet aroma of the milk caressed his nostrils, promising him of the power he would soon gain! Yet as he raised it up, there was no sensation of growth.

Sam blinked in confusion.

He lowered the carton down, before peering into it. While difficult to see, Sam noticed that the milk was completely gone, leaving not even a spare drop for him to taste.

Dread pooled in his stomach at the sudden revelation. All of his hopes for gaining more muscle were utterly crushed.

"Hey, what are you doing?" Ryan asked inquisitively as soon as the muscular boy got to the kitchen. The boy quickly noticed the empty carton though, and smiled victoriously, "Nothing left? That's too bad. Honestly, you kinda deserve it for being so mean to us all the time."

"Shut up!" Sam yelled in a fit of anger.

The older brother threw the empty package at Ryan, though it impacted harmlessly against tight abs. Still, that didn't stop Sam from shouting obscenities at him. He was so immersed in his accusations that he didn't even notice his mom entering the room.

"What is going on in here? Sam, stop that at once!" Her stern voice brought a halt to his tirade, even if he was still pissed off.

"But mom! Ryan drank some kind of muscle milk, and... and he..."

Sam's voice failed him when he took in his mom's appearance. Gone was the somewhat chubby red-haired woman, who easily caved in to his demands. In her place stood a proud and confident woman, standing much taller and most importantly, a lot wider due to the pounds upon pounds of muscle on her elegant frame.

Rachel Hawkins was unimpressed by her son's behavior, which showed by how she crossed two bulky arms over a very muscular chest. Wearing nothing but a tank top that used to be a shirt but was now too small, and a pair of leggings that were stretched thin over meaty legs, she was an intimidating sight.

He tried not to stare at those big biceps, each of them possibly measuring around fifteen inches of solid beef, but his attention was also drawn to her wide legs and thick chest. Twin slabs of pectoral meat carried an impressive bust, which was starting to tear at the the already small shirt.

In fact, where there had once been sleeves, there was now nothing but rags and torn threads. Obviously his mother had ripped them off her striated deltoids. Perhaps he was dreaming, but he was sure she hadn't been that tall. She was as tall as a friend's dad, who stood at six feet!

"Well? I'm waiting for whatever excuse you have for me now, young man." Rachel said crossly, giving him an impatient look. It was way scarier now that she could probably lift her own body-weight, "Imagine my surprise when I was putting away some clothes, and suddenly my oldest son decided to start ranting in my house."

"But Ryan drank this weird milk and grew big muscles!" He tried to reason with her.

His mom simply raised an eyebrow, "Just like I did, then. Peter and I have had some as well, and I left milk on the table. Don't worry about that, Ryan, you're not in trouble."

Sam heard his brother sigh in relief, but that only filled him with more anger and spite, "So you let him get bigger, but not me? That's so not fair. You're all selfish!"

Annoyed by his talking back, Rachel moved forward and glared at him. Her massive thighs positively swelled with each step that she took. Sam could make out the different lumps and shapes stacked onto the limb, giving her muscular curves that were undeniably attractive.

"That's enough out of you, Sam. You will not talk back to me that tone." His mom declared with all the authority that only a mother possessed. Only this time, she had big muscles to back up her statement, which made Sam pause, "Honestly, what is it with you and that temper? I was thinking about letting you have some milk too, but I'm seriously reconsidering it if you're going to be so foul-tempered."

Sam gasped in shock, not having expected that answer. He desperately wanted to grow big and strong, so he didn't want to lose his only shot at it. Plus, his pride wouldn't allow him to be smaller than any of his brothers.

"No, wait! Please, mom, I'm sorry. I'll be good!" He pleaded fervently.

"Mhm..." Rachel hummed, deciding on what to do.
11333221.title: Sam discovers the milk

choices: Ryan takes advantage of his new muscles
Sam finds Tim

113332211.content:
Eventually, Rachel came to a decision as she declared, "Wait here for me."

The single mother promptly walked away, leaving her two sons in the kitchen. Sam watched her go with envy. How big would he get if his mother, who had once been so average, was now a mix between a fitness model and an amateur bodybuilder? It was difficult to not be jealous.

Speaking of which...

The eldest son scowled when his younger brother began casually flexing. Jealousy surged through the 13-year-old as Ryan's shirt was stretched thin over sturdy pectorals, followed by defined biceps that popped up whenever he 'pretended' to simply move his arm around.

Obviously this was an attempt to get back at him. What was even worse, however, was that it was working. Sam had never felt so jealous before in his entire life.

He wanted muscles too, dammit! What kind of older brother was weaker than his younger siblings? Besides, he was the obvious choice, considering he was good at sports whereas Ryan was more interested in comic books and movies.

As for his mom... Well, he could hardly tell her not to drink the milk. As rebellious as he was, even he didn't dare mess with her. Especially now that she could be considered a gym regular.

Sam snapped out of his thoughts once his mom returned, sauntering into the kitchen while carrying something in her hand; a half-full glass of milk. Excitement bubbled up inside of him as he regarded the white substance.

So, that was what made his family so muscular. He couldn't wait to try it out! Sam would drink it, and then he'd be the biggest again, leaving Ryan in the dust. His imagination ran wild; him as an incredibly muscular boy, flaunting his physique at school and over his brothers.

However, his dreams were crushed again, as Rachel passed him by and walked up to his younger brother, who looked equally surprised.

"I've decided your punishment." She declared as if answering the unspoken question. The red-haired amateur bodybuilder gave him a neutral look, "Seeing as you continue to act out, and even threw a tantrum -- not even mentioning your behavior as of late -- I have chosen not to give you any milk for now."

He couldn't quite stop his outburst, "What?! But that's not fair!"

"It wasn't fair when you bullied your brother and refused to listen to me. Had you been a bit nicer, I would have agreed. Now though, you will have to wait until I change my mind." His mother turned to Ryan, "That being said, there is still your punishment for what you've done. And Ryan is going to help me."

"Huh?!"

"I am?"

Rachel nodded, "Indeed. Since it's clear that you want to be the biggest, your punishment will be the opposite of that. Ryan gets to drink more milk but not you."

Despair washed over him like a tidal wave, sweeping away his hopes of growing. This was his worst nightmare! Sam looked at his brother for a reaction, and saw that there was a mix of excitement and vengeance in those green eyes.

"Now, drink up your milk, Ryan. Only my good and well-behaved sons get to be big and strong like their mommy."

"Sure thing, mom!" The younger boy smiled widely, before taking the offered glass.

Sam desperately wanted to argue, but no words came out of his mouth as Ryan raised the glass to his lips and drank. Every last drop of milk vanished into the boy's belly. In only a matter of seconds, the glass was empty and Ryan licked his lips for any leftovers.

And then it happened.

Ryan groaned audibly this time around, letting everyone hear how he felt as the milk did its magical work. Muscles that were already defined and big for a boy his age suddenly began to expand.

The 9-years-old boy clenched his fists hard as the veins on his arms pulsated, spreading out to increase their reach. After all, plenty of nutrients needed to be fed to the sudden mass that grew out of nowhere. Triceps shaped like horseshoes flared out from underneath his upper arms, while the peaks of his biceps rose like mighty mountains. The muscle fibers reached all the way up to wide shoulders and big deltoids, which resembled peeled onions because of the clearly visible striations.

Soft grunts escaped Sam's younger brother as the boy's legs beefed up considerably. Lumps and bumps swelled on his legs, and quadriceps morphed themselves into teardrop-shaped bulges. The seams of his shorts were torn apart rather rapidly by the ever expanding mass of hard muscle. Ryan's vascular thighs had swelled to astound proportions in a matter of seconds.

Ryan subconsciously tensed his chest, allowing his solid abdominals to stand out even more as they became denser and thicker, turning into plates of armor. Instead of simply a toned stomach, Ryan possessed what could only be described as a ripped six-pack that was on the brim of turning into an 8-pack. Similarly, his pectorals widened and jutted outwards by a few good inches. The slabs of meat were wide enough to be mistaken for book covers. A deep line ran between the two to highlight their definition.

Sam felt like he might faint, watching his little brother grow like that. He eyed the boy's rising traps, which flared out like wings on his brother's back, and how every inch of skin was covering hard muscle. Ryan had grown a few inches taller too, much to his despair.

The younger brother's body was shining with a small layer of sweat from the intense growth spurt. The exposed skin glistened slightly, and to be fair it was a lot; not much remained of Ryan's clothes.

The boy's shorts were rags at this point. They hung loosely around his waist, but the pants had fallen apart because of Ryan's huge thighs. The same could be said for his shirt. Unlike the shorts that still clung to his immense bulk, it had not survived the growth, and was now lying on the floor in pieces.

This allowed everyone to observe Ryan's barrel chest that rose and fell rhythmically. Dense pecs and hard abs were put on display, and it became abundantly clear that the boy had more to offer.

"Aww, look at my baby! All big and strong. Flex your muscles for mommy, please?" Rachel gushed loudly.

Ryan smiled widely as he did as he was told. The muscular 9-years-old did a clumsy double bicep pose, but the sheer muscularity of his amazing physique made up for the sloppy form.

Two softball-sized biceps exploded upwards, veins spreading and forearms bulging as he flexed. It was official; Ryan was the biggest boy of his age in the whole country. Probably even the whole world!

Sam watched with a mix of fear, awe and envy at his brother's body. The physique that his brother sported was on par with what teenage bodybuilders worked for! Yet since Ryan was still relatively short, all that muscle mass looked even more prominent on his frame.

"Look at me, mom!" The young boy cheered happily, "I'm a lot bigger now!"

"You certainly are, sweetie." His mom agreed wholeheartedly. The amazon of a woman palmed her son's biceps, "Mhm, not as big as mommy, but still a lot bigger than anyone your age. Just the way it should be!"

No words could describe the disappointment that Sam felt as he watched his brother flex those huge muscles. That milk should have been his! Now he was a lot smaller than his younger brother!

"I'm going to go run some errands now. Make sure to behave!" He blinked numbly, not even registering his mom leaving the kitchen.

His attention was instead directed to Ryan, who shot him a confident smirk. A shiver traveled down his spine. The difference between their muscles was all too apparent now. Whereas he was above average for his age, Ryan was now a muscle prodigy, standing easily at just over five feet tall and what had to be more than 150 pounds of muscle.

Sam looked uncomfortable by the smug look his younger brother gave him. It got even worse as Ryan took a deep breath, causing his meaty pectorals to inflate, and his chest got even broader.

"So, who is the strongest now?"

This was a cruel punishment.

1133322111.content:
Life in the Hawkins household changed drastically. It was a given; three quarters of its family members were now sporting impressively muscular physiques, whereas the last one was stuck with only an athletic build.

Sam was constantly reminded of what his brothers and even his mother had gained. Despite his wishes of having large muscles like the rest, he didn't get any milk whatsoever, meaning the young boy didn't get to grow. The punishment for his bad behavior was the worst one he'd ever had in his life.

Each morning he woke up to his family doing some kind of exercise. Last Monday, his mom and younger brother had gone for a quick jog. By the time the two had gotten back home, their bodies had been glistening with sweat and their muscles pumped.

It was embarrassing to walk past a brother who was three years younger, yet had abs and legs that were so much more defined. Ryan's legs looked as if were sculpted out of marble, dammit!

The same could be said for his mother, whose legs were even thicker and wider. That was another such thing; Rachel loved to show of her new pair of legs by wearing very tight shorts or pants, and sometimes played with them while not noticing. She'd rub them, trail the deep ridges between the individual muscles or pat them.

Was it wrong that he thought she looked much better with those muscular legs? Then again, he always had a thing for muscles, so he wasn't surprised that buff girls were attractive to him.

But Sam just couldn't escape the harsh reality that he was now an infant compared to his younger brothers. Well, maybe not completely since he was still taller and noticeably older than Tim, but the youngest of the three also possessed such defined muscles.

Out of all of his friends, Tim was the most muscular and it showed. Their mom went shopping with the little guy because most of his wardrobe was now too small for him. That realization didn't come without casualties; Tim's favorite Spiderman shirt had fallen apart because it was too small around the 6-years-old's ripped chest.

The milk had done wonders for the Hawkins family, depending on who you asked. Sam would say that it was unfair that he didn't get any. Tim would say that he loved it, because now he looked like a superhero, and no bully could intimidate him anymore.

Rachel would also happily tell why it changed her life for the better. She used to be a bit plain and tired before, but now she was a bundle of energy and even -- dare he say it -- sexier. As for Ryan; well, the second child treated his new muscles like the best gift ever.

Seriously, his brother showed off at any moment of the day. Yesterday they had gone to the supermarket, where Ryan had grabbed two melons and casually lifted them, acting as if they were weights, which only served to draw attention to his firm biceps.

Now that he though about it; Ryan was really rubbing it in that he was smaller than his younger brother now. The situation at home was pretty much the same.

The milk -- and more importantly the muscles that it gave -- was apparently an incentive for Ryan to pick on Sam. Not that the younger boy did anything that would get him into trouble with mom. Oh, not at all. However, that didn't prevent Ryan from belittling him though.

Sam pouted heavily, standing close to the window as his family had a blast outside. Their home wasn't small by any means, and his parents had thought of adding a large backyard, which provided them with a good place of relaxation during the summer.

In this case, his mother and younger siblings used it as a workout spot. Rachel had bought an entire assortment of weights and equipment to fill a small gym. One might say that they didn't need it because of the milk, but clearly bodybuilding was now the most practiced hobby of the Hawkins family -- sans him.

The afternoon was yet another workout moment for his family. Sam watched them lift weights from a distance. His brothers were busy working primarily on their arms.

Both Tim and Ryan were shirtless, leaving their ripped torsos bare to glisten in the sunlight. The heavy dumbbells in their hands went up and down as they worked out. The boys' biceps were pumped by the exercise, and were looking bigger than ever.

Tim was using smaller weights than Ryan, but that was to be expected. The kid was still young. Despite possessing muscles beyond his age group, Tim wasn't allowed to do his workout sessions with weights that were too big, in case he got hurt. Mom was protective like that.

But Ryan was a completely different story. The youngster got to play with the big weights; Ryan was currently curling forty pounds with each arm, pushing his already considerable strength to the limit.

However, neither of his brothers could compare to the matriarch of their family. The buff woman was like an amateur bodybuilder when it came to size, but that also brought along a surprising amount of power.

Rachel was lying underneath a barbell, her striated back on the bench as she raised the bar with precise movement, lifting a staggering weight that left Sam in awe. He'd only seen bodybuilders in videos lift that much. Her gargantuan chest and arms flexed heavily with each rep.

Sam turned away disgruntled. It should be him on that bench, showing off while lifting all that weight. His jealousy got worse each day, and he knew that. Of course, he just didn't care.

But none of his searches for the special milk had worked out so far. Wherever his mom had taken it, the milk was hidden away good. Sam wondered if it was even inside the house at all.

"Where did she put it..." The eldest son muttered under his breath.

"Talking to yourself? That's pretty weird."

He almost jumped into the air in surprise. Standing behind him was Ryan, who grinned knowingly and was not apologetic at all for coming out of nowhere. The other boy was leaning against the wall, with his chest still naked and sweaty from the intense workout.

"Buzz off." Sam grunted.

His words went unheeded though, "Aww, is that any way to talk to your big bro?"

"Hey, I'm the oldest around here!"

"Not anymore. I think there's a new big brother in the house." Ryan's grin widened as he flexed his biceps. Seeing as he was shirtless, his whole upper body squirmed as the muscle fibers twitched, and Sam had to watch it all. Both biceps and triceps practically exploded with mass, "See these? Mom and I measured them last night; they're 14.5 inches of solid beef. Almost catching up to her!"

Sam grimaced as he was forced to look at his brother's arms. His gaze trailed the thick veins that crisscrossed over the ripped muscles, pumping nutrients into the engorged biceps. They truly were big.

"Yeah? Well, whatever." He scowled and turned around, ready to leave.

"Oi! I didn't say you could go just yet!" Ryan said assertively as he grabbed him.

"Let me go, Ryan!" Sam growled.

The younger boy merely gave another smug grin, "Or what? Are you strong enough to push me back? Go on; give it a try."

With anger coursing through his system, Sam did as he was told. He placed both hands on Ryan's sturdy chest, and tried to shove him away. However, it felt like he was pushing against a tree. All ten fingers of his dug into the solid beef of his brother's chest, and even shifted his weight for more effect, yet Ryan remained an unmovable tree.

"Come on, Sam! Is that all you got? I didn't know you were so weak!" Ryan laughed loudly, placing his hands on his hips.

Before Sam could fire back a retort, his younger brother suddenly wrapped an arm around his neck. He yelped loudly as Ryan locked a beefy arm around him. Forced to bend slightly over, he started struggling in an attempt to break free.

"Let me go! This isn't funny." He complained.

Yet his efforts went in vain. He couldn't pry away the muscular arm that was wrapped around his head, and Sam's face flushed with embarrassment as he was toyed with by Ryan.

"Only if you say please." The boy grinned.

He growled stubbornly, "Never!"

"That's not the answer I'm looking for." Ryan quickly tightened his hold, "Try again."

Sam gasped as the pressure increased. By now, he could feel his brother's hard muscles press against his body, eliciting a cry of pain. It didn't help that his head was being brushed against Ryan's sweaty chest; the boy's defined pecs in particular.

"Alright! You win, dammit. Please let me go." The eldest finally relented.

Ryan gave a pleased hum and allowed him to go free. Sam staggered back, regaining his bearings before shooting his younger brother a fierce glare. Of course, all he got in return was a smug grin.

The older boy stalked away in defeat, but not without inner promises of vengeance.

Both muscles began to push out, making his shoulders wider while making his t-shirt fit a lot tighter. His pectorals pushed out further and further, stopping right before almost bursting out of his t-shirt!

"Wow! Look at your chest!" Paul exclaimed.

"Whoa! My chest feels really heavy now!" Daniel sighed.

The tingling continued further south as Daniel's flat stomach suddenly gained a mighty eight-pack of rows and columns of abdominals, which were clearly visible through the thin, cotton t-shirt as well.

"Dude! You're turning into a muscle man!" Paul gasped.

Daniel looked at his friend in shock. Lunch recess was almost over and here he was, bulging muscle all over. How was he going to explain this to the other classmates? Worse, how was he going to explain this to mom? Lastly, what if the growth spurts weren't over yet?

131111111.content:
When Dr. Rosner walked into the examination room and saw Daniel the first time, he was completely astonished.

"Wow... Have you been living in the gym?" the doctor asked Daniel.

"No! I was at school and I just had lunch and before I knew it all my muscles started to grow out of nowhere!" Daniel explained.

"Okay, well let's take some tests..." the doctor suggested.

Within the next hour, the doctor took pictures, an MRI, x-rays, he drew some blood, and a bunch more tests of Daniel before he allowed the boy back into the small private examination room with his mother.

After about twenty minutes, the doctor walked in with an envelope filled with printouts and charts and x-rays. He examined them before he announced the results to Daniel and his mother.

"It seems as if Daniel's body has absorbed some sort of toxic chemical that has caused his muscles to go into a long growth cycle" the doctor explained. "He's going through several growth spurts which lead to accelerated muscle growth which make his muscles grow bigger every time he has a growth spurt. In other words, he's continually growing stronger and stronger. His muscles keep on becoming denser all the time which lead to increased physical strength."

"What's going to happen if he keeps on growing stronger?" Daniel's mother asked.

"Well, eventually he'll become... superhuman..." the doctor said calmly. "And we're not so sure what that will be like since we've never seen anyone experience this before."

"What do you mean, superhuman?" Daniel wondered.

"You'll be far stronger than any human, you'll be able to run much faster and leap much further and jump much higher... You'll be indestructable... You'll become superhuman very soon, my boy..." the doctor explained.

"Wow..." Daniel sighed.

"Okay... Thank you, doctor..." his mom said, as she and Daniel got up and left the clinic.

As Daniel walked towards the car, which was parked outside of the doctor's office, he suddenly got an idea.

"Mom, how far are we from home?" he asked his mother.

"We're about four miles away, honey. It's not that far. It's just down this street..." his mom replied.

"Do you mind if I walk home?" he asked her.

"Are you sure?"

"Yeah..."

"Alright, suit youself. You have your cell phone. Call me if you get tired!" mom said, before she started the engine of the SUV and drove off.

"Ha! I bet I'm so strong now that I can beat her home!" Daniel grinned, as he started running.

Indeed, he started running faster and faster and he wasn't feeling tired. Then, he realized he was quickly picking up speed, and he was catching up to the cars on the road, since he was running on the sidewalk.

Suddenly, there was a small puddle in the sidewalk, and he decided to just jump over it rather than step over it. When he jumped, he soared over the sidewalk by ten feet in the air, landing over twenty-five feet away!

"Whoa! I can JUMP! That is awesome!" he cheered after he landed. "My legs are super strong!"

When he realized he needed to cross the three-lane road, he just LEAPED across, vaulting across sixty-five feet of paved road until easily landing on the other side.

"Whoohoo! This is easy!" he cheered, reaching speeds of 50 miles per hour as he leaped through the air and soared over his own driveway and landed on the roof of his house. "This is FUN!"

The super-strong boy then leaped from the roof and landed in front of the main entrance to the house, a minute before his mom arrived.

"Daniel! How did you get here so fast?" she asked him as she pulled into the garage.

"I ran and leaped over the streets. It was really easy. I can outrun the cars and leap over the buildings!" he cheered.

Mom then opened the door and let the muscular boy in the house.

13111111121.content:
As soon as Daniel got into the house, he walked right up to his bedroom so he could change clothes. He decided to lie down on his bed and relax, when he was suddenly overcome by an odd, tingling sensation after that run from the doctor's office.

"Oh man... Another growth spurt!" he said, as he ran to the bathroom and observed his reflection in the large mirror on the wall.

Then it happened.

Daniel had the incredible urge to clench his fists and to raise up his arms in order to flex both of them, making both his biceps pop up. Then, a deep, rumbling sound came from deep inside of him. His massive biceps then stiffened and hardened, before they began to inflate some more!

"Ohhh man! I'm... GROWING! Arrrgggg!" Daniel groaned, as he felt every muscle tense up!

RRRRRIPPPPPP!!!!

Daniel burst out of the sleeves of his bigger shirt, as his huge biceps ballooned even BIGGER, to the size of soccer balls, filling up with enormous power!

CRACCKKKKK!!!!

Daniel's shirt then tore down the middle as his pectorals began to push outward and sidewards, growing even BIGGER than before, practically pushing the fabric of his t-shirt to its limit until his mighty pecs ripped out of his shirt.

"Ohhhh man.... OOOOHHHHH!" he groaned, since there was no sign of stopping.

His massive calves and quads grew to TITANIC proportions, giving his legs the power of rocket boosters! He would now have the physical strength to run and to leap into the air unlike ANY human being in history! Massive mounds of muscle formed on his legs, above and below the legs, packing on some much muscle, that the boy practically felt his strength double... and TRIPLE in a matter of seconds. He could break ANY world record in track and field, in high jump, pole vault, or anything involving distance running, skating, swimming, or any other sport with endurance, due to the INSANE amount of muscle that had now formed on Daniel's body.

"Uuuuuuhhhhrrrr!!!!" he groaned.

RRIPPPPPP!!!

Daniel's shorts ripped in half when his titanic quads burst through his cotton shorts, ripping the clothing in shreads due to the inhuman amount of muscle that was forming on the boy's body.

In short, Daniel had packed on so much muscle, that it took him a minute to regain the ability to move. For a moment, it seemed like he had become immobile, as if he had just grown too big, but once he moved his mighty arms and legs, he was able to move freely again.

As he looked at his reflection in the mirror, the vision confirmed what he was feeling. He felt big and heavy. But he was STRONG. Very, VERY STRONG.

This must be what the doctor called... superhuman.

"Wow..." he whispered, as he ran his hand over his massive arms and chest. "I'm... I'm huge... My arms, my legs... I feel stronger than anything... Stronger than anyone... I'm the strongest being on earth... I'm... superhuman!"

Daniel sighed.

He had to go back to school the next day. His mom had to make some bigger clothes for him, first.

But, what would it be like to go to school as a boy who was superhuman?

He turned around and walked outside.

He saw a tree before him, with several green leaves hanging from it's branches.

Daniel then took a deep breath, and exhaled, blowing all his air out at the tree.

SWWWOOOOOOOOOSSSSHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!

Hurricane-force winds escaped from Daniel's lungs and mouth, blowing every leaf from the tree that was standing before him.All the leaves were blown off and feel to the ground, several feet away from the tree, on the opposite side of where Daniel was standing.

"Wow! I got super-breath!" Daniel grinned, as he walked to an open, grassy area on the large lawn in front of his house.

Then, he decided to just jump straight up in the air. He just wanted to use minimal effort, to see how high he could jump using his new muscles.

SSWWWWOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOSSSSSSSSHHHHHHH!!!!!!!

Suddenly, several neighbors were looking up as they spotted a short, very muscular boy soaring into the air, as if he got shot into the sky by a cannon!

Daniel was soaring higher and higher... Ascending to 100 feet... 200 feet... 300 feet... The boy looked down, seeing the ground move farther away as he saw the rooftops and the streets become smaller and smaller, as his rate of ascent slowly decreased. Finally, he stopped climbing until he finally started to fall back to the ground!

"Wwwweeeeee!" he cheered, as he started falling back to the grass field below, from a height of nearly 400 feet. All he needed to do is keep his feet pointed to the ground, until he finally landed on his super-powerful legs on the grass.

"Wow! I could leap 400 feet into the air, and that's without even trying!" he grinned. "Being superhuman is GREAT!"

Daniel just grinned. He took off running and quickly raced to 80 miles per hour, blasting through the neighhborhood until he cruised through the streets. He soared around the area, racing to other parts of town, until he made it all the way to school and back in just a few seconds. And, he wasn't even tired.

"I'm gonna have fun at school tomorrow..." he laughed, as he walked back into the house. He took off his shoes and decided to rest his massive muscles.

132.content:
Our story begins at Mission Dolores Park, located in the heart of San Francisco, California. This large, beautiful park, which offers over thirteen acres of green grass and palm trees, including tennis courts, a soccer field, a basketball court, a playground, and a dog play area, so there is plenty to see and do for people of all ages.

With so much to do, it's perfectly understandable that people will become hungry... and thirsty after a while. This is where men like Sherman Jones come in. Sherman pushes his little cart onto the park grounds every day and sets up shop as soon as the gates open. He sets up in the shade, so that he - and his customers - can stay cool. His cart has a small compartment underneath which has a drawer which is filled with ice cubes, so anything kept in there can remain nice and cold for several hours. Sherman keeps cans of soda, sandwiches, and a few cartons of milk in there, for those customers who prefer to drink something that is healthy.

Sherman picks up his fresh food and drinks from his supplier before pushing his cart into the park, just down the road. He gets customers of all ages, speaking many different languages ranging from Spanish to Chinese to Japanese and even some French and Korean thrown in now and then. But Sherman treats everyone equally with kindness and respect, from the youngest child to the oldest customer.

Today was no exception. Sherman picked up his fresh fruit, drinks and cartons of milk, including one carton which had slightly modified milk in it. Unknown to Sherman, he would end up selling that carton of milk to someone that day, and that act would end up changing that person's life forever.

Who would the lucky customer be?
132.title: Another boy in 9th or 10th grade

choices: Charlie grows a foot taller and more muscular the next morning
Charlie suddenly gains more muscle!
Charlie has a dramatic growth spurt!
1321.content:
Charlie Wong had been kicking his soccer ball back and forth to three of his friends for the past two hours. His mother had left him in the park, just down the street from their apartment, since she had to do some shopping while his father was still at work. His mother had gone to the store with his little sister, so what better thing to do then to hang out at the big park with some of the other kids?

Charlie was an active, happy kid. His father was from Hong Kong, and his mom was from Shanghai. He was born in San Francisco and he had never been anywhere else. He loved soccer and baseball, and this was the time of year that all the kids loved to be out in the park kicking the old soccer ball around. Plus, being fifteen years old and only having two or three good friends meant only having a few places to hang out during the long, hot and humid summer.

The weather was nice today and he was happy that it wasn’t raining. The wind had kicked up, but it still made it a nice day to go out to the park and to kick some ball. A bunch of kids were out on the soccer field, so they had enough to create a team. Charlie scored a goal, and that had made his day. He just played soccer for fun, but he liked to talk about professional players and dreamed of watching the pros play in person some time.

The only thing about soccer was that he would get really thirsty after spending an hour or so chasing after that ball. He only had a Dollar with him, of which he spent some of it on gum. He was dumb enough to forget his water bottle at home again, so this time, he had to buy something to drink. He finally wandered off the pitch and searched for that little guy who was standing off in the shade somewhere, peddling snacks and drinks. Hopefully he still had something in his cart for fifty cents.

The boy jogged up to the snack cart, which was neatly parked under the big palm tree. Charlie wasn’t very skinny, but he wasn’t chubby ether. He was stocky but not fat, but not very athletic. He was about 5-foot-4 inches tall and weighed about 165 pounds. He played soccer in order not to gain any more weight, which was easy to do with all the soda vending machines everywhere. His mother had already restricted his soda intake dramatically, so Charlie decided to get something other than that.

Sherman looked up as a boy wearing a soccer jersey, cleats, shorts and long athletic socks came running towards him. The boy looked hot and sweaty, with his long, straight jet-black hair blowing in the wind. The boy looked Asian for sure, but he had a friendly facial expression and he was of average height.

“Hello!” Charlie said, as he finally came up to the cart. “Got anything to drink?”

“Well, hello there, young man! I certainly have! I have some fruit juice, lemonade, coke, diet, milk, and orange juice!” Sherman replied. “What do you feel like?”

“Uhmmm…” Charlie sighed, as he reached down in his pocket and pulled out two quarters. “I only got two quarters and I’m really not allowed to have any soda from my mom…”

“Hmm…” Sherman pondered. “All the juices are seventy-five cents… The only thing that’s left is this!”

Sherman squatted down and opened the bottom compartment of his cart. He pulled out a small carton of milk and set it on the counter top before Charlie.

“Milk?”

“It’s my last one!”

Charlie made a face.

“You got anything else?” he said with a deep sigh.

“Hey… Milk is good for you, my boy!” Sherman grinned. “A carton is actually sixty cents! I’ll let you have it for fifty!”

“Blahhh… Milk!” Charlie groaned. “Then I’d rather have soda!”

“Noooo… Don’t give in to temptation!” Sherman said angrily! “Are you allowed to have soda from your mother?”

Charlie let out an even deeper sigh. Then he set the two quarters down on the counter. He reached over and grabbed the carton of milk.

“Hey kid… Milk is better for you than soda! Milk helps you GROW! It’s good for your bones!” Sherman grinned, as Charlie started to walk away.

“Thanks, Mister…” Charlie said. He was too thirsty to argue. He opened the spout of the carton and started to drink the milk. He had to admit that the milk actually tasted pretty good once it hit his dry tongue.

He drank half of it before he started walking home. He was tired. He needed to get home anyway since it was already getting late in the afternoon. At least he had some cold milk to quench that thirst and he wouldn’t arrive home completely dying of thirst and totally dehydrated. Then his mother would chew him out over that! And… he didn’t have any soda.

Halfway to the house he drank the rest of the milk carton before tossing the empty carton in one of the trash dumpsters on the street. He noted that the milk did seem to have a funny aftertaste to it. Maybe it was starting to get sour or something. Hopefully it wasn’t going to make him sick. The team was taking a break during half-time and Andy was looking to buy something from the snack bar, which was just a few yards away from the soccer field.

“Can I get a soda?” he asked the lady behind the counter.

“That will be two Dollars.” The lady responded.

Andy frantically dug in his pocket in his soccer uniform and remembered that he only had one Dollar with him, since he forgot to ask his father for money.

“Oh, nuts… I only got a Dollar with me… Do you have anything else for a Dollar?” he asked the lady.

“The only thing I can sell you here for a Dollar is a small carton of milk…” she replied.

“Milk?” Andy said with disgust.

“Hey, champ…” the lady said to him in a stern voice. “Take it. You shouldn’t be drinking all that soda during a game anyway! It’s all sugar! Here!” she said, as she took the small, white carton of milk out of the cooler and set it on the counter before the young soccer player.

“Oh, I may as well… I’m thirsty as a llama right now…” Andy sighed as he gave the lady his only Dollar bill and reached for the carton with his other hand.

Andy casually strolled back to the aluminum benches, which were placed along the edge of the soccer field, where all the other boys were sitting. Several other boys came up to him.

The coach headed to the basement, and started benching the heaviest weights he had. Tons of heavy bicep curls later, he downed another drink of the shake. Some push ups and chin ups later, he finishes the super shake. He started feeling really weird, in a good way. His tank top started feeling tighter than usual, and he couldn't help but notice a bigger bulge in his pants.

The coach burps loudly, and his clothes explode. His muscle fibers, already big, became three times their size. He looked like his son now.

"What the fuck? So that was it! The milk! Kevin grew huge because of it. He drank a glass of it... But he was a fat loser, and he became a huge bodybuilder. I was already big, and I drank the rest of the gallon." he started laughing in a manic way.

"I can hear that man laughing. Oh, no! Mom may have arrived, and he could be hitting her. Time to teach that jerk a lesson." he said, flexing and kissing his bowling ball biceps.

Kevin goes downstairs and sees the empty milk gallon. He hadn't think about it, but his dad laugh sounded deeper now, just like his own voice had become deeper after his growth spurt. And his groth spurt, the only thing he had was milk before the practice, and he admitted it had a funny taste. He had a bad feeling about it now.

Kevin goes to the basement, and he is shocked to see a huge giant sitting there. The coach barely fit in the basement now. He was five times a regular human, and the coach muscles were ten times the size of Kevin's. A huge pipe of hard meat was between his legs, the size of a really tall adult man. You could clearly see veins pumping power.

153.content:
Rachel and Olivia were two sisters, aged 14 and 11 respectively. They were close to each other, and both fairly smart, but beyond that they were nothing particularly remarkable. Rachel loved science and was often in her room reading about advanced chemistry or physics. Olivia was more into reading and drawing, and was more frequently seen at the library than anywhere else. Both were, consequently, not exactly the most popular girls in their school. Rachel was certainly good-looking enough to attract a significant amount of attention from boys, but she didn't want a relationship - she just wanted to focus on her studies. In fact her well-developed body only made the bullying worse, as everyone knows that jealous girls can be the meanest.

Sometimes both girls had been bullied physically, with neither of them being particularly tall or sporty or strong. Both Rachel's high school and Olivia's middle school knew about it, but not a lot was done, as the bullies and their families were fairly well-connected within the schools. Rachel and Olivia's parents both worked long hours, making it difficult for them to intervene as well.

The trade-off of having little time with their children was that Rachel and Olivia's parents actually made a decent salary. Josh, their father, was a salesman who often travelled the world. Their mother, Nicole, was a manager at a local factory. They liked to spoil their kids whenever they had a chance, and nothing made them prouder than to see them grow into such amazing young women. For Rachel they often bought new science kits and rare materials for her to experiment with. For Olivia, they bought her all the books and art supplies she could use.

And sometimes, when they were all together, they liked to take them out to shop for nice clothes, or have some fun at the park, or as was the case on this particular evening, to go out to a fancy restaurant.

"Fancy" was almost an understatement. Situated on the waterfront, the restaurant was one of the most prestigious in the world. The whole family were wearing their best clothes and still had to resolve not to buy most of the items on the menu, because even though the family was quite well-off, they were not rich enough for that place. Even the atmosphere inside the restaurant seemed to smell of wealth, all kinds of the richest people congregating there to make billion-dollar deals after all.

After some hushed discussion, Rachel and Olivia both insisted on having a drink other than water. Josh chuckled to himself and bought them both the next-least expensive thing - glasses of milk - annoying both of his daughters, as Olivia had actually wanted a fruit juice and Rachel something alcoholic.

"This better be the best milk I've ever had in my life" laughed Olivia.
"Come on, milk's good for you" retorted Josh.

The restaurant did not take long at all in serving the meals, all of which, despite their being among the cheapest on the menu, looked more divine than almost anything any of them had ever eaten. Next to it, the glasses of milk for Rachel and Olivia, and the glasses of water for Josh and Nicole (despite the fancy glasses it was served in) were positively boring.
153.title: A family with two girls.
