1532.content:
After dinner, the family drove home.

"Thanks so much for the dinner!" cheered Olivia.
"Yeah, I feel really good after that" added Rachel "Weirdly good, actually."
"You'd think so, with what they charge!" replied Josh.
"Oh honey, you know what that place is like" said Nicole "The way I see it, you two are the most perfect girls in the world. You deserve nothing less from us!"
"That's what I meant" said Josh quickly "Didn't mean to grumble at all."

The family pulled up outside their house.
"Alright girls, it's late, and you have school tomorrow. You should get ready for bed." said Josh.
Rachel and Olivia rushed out of the car, while Josh and Nicole stayed behind for a long kiss.

Soon afterwards, Olivia had changed out of her beautiful dress into her sleepwear, and was reading in her bed, when Nicole came in.
"Did you have a nice day, sweetheart?" she asked.
"Yeah, and an even better night!" asserted Olivia "That restaurant was aye-may-zing!"
"I'm glad you liked it so much" half-yawned Nicole "Let's hope the bullies don't give you too much of a hard time at school tomorrow, alright?"
"Yeah" said Olivia "Let's not think about them as I'm about to go to bed, ok?"
Nicole smiled. "Sweet dreams. I love you. If you ever need or want anything, just ask, ok?"
"Sure mom!" smiled Olivia as Nicole leaned down to give her a kiss "Good night!"

Meanwhile in the room next door, Nicole was staying up late messing with some chemicals.
"You really need some sleep" said Josh, coming in "You'll be tired in the morning!"
"This experiment is really important though, dad!" protested Nicole, who was still wearing her best dress "Please can I stay up a bit later?"
"Alright then" sighed Josh "But I'll have to say goodnight now. Nicole and I are shattered."
"Good night then!" said Rachel shortly.
"Good night my love" said Josh, exiting "I'm so proud of you."

Olivia read for a few more minutes before going off to a deep sleep. She dreamt that she was at the Olympic Games, holding the torch for her country. She dreamt she was competing in the decathlon against - men? No, that couldn't be right. But somehow when the events started, all the men kept losing to her. Not only did she thrash all the men, but she wasn't even trying! She won the gold with the greatest of ease, millions of people in the stands chanting her name. Just then, in her dream, an official came up and announced that she had been disqualified for using performance enhancing substances. Olivia tried to protest that she would never do that, but soon enough some police showed up to try to take her to jail. With ease she threw the police off her and began to run away as fast as she could, the world around her becoming a blur as she moved at superhuman speeds, when suddenly, she woke up.

Her whole body was aching. Immediately she knew that something, somehow, wasn't quite right. Her cellphone alarm buzzing, she quickly turned it off before sitting up in her bed. She was so sore, she almost started to wonder if she was somehow sick. Thinking better of it, the next thing she thought of was to try to look at herself in her mirror, to see if any obvious symptoms were visible. She quickly took off her sleepwear and headed to her bedroom mirror to take a look. Then, she gasped.

The transformation was incredible. Her previously average body now had muscles to put any junior cheerleader or gymnast to shame. Even the boys in her class didn't have muscles like this. Her legs and arms ... every inch of her young body was wrapped in armor-like solid slabs of muscles, from her perfectly defined 8-pack abs to her massive calves to her thick biceps ... there was definitely no shortage of new features on her body to look at. Indeed the only part of her that seemed relatively unchanged was her face, which retained its cute, youthful look. As well as extreme muscles, Olivia also felt like she was a little taller, and just slightly slimmer as well, though it was hard to tell.

"No wonder I'm sore" gasped Olivia as she flexed a little. Her new form looked amazing - so amazing that she could hardly believe it was her. A rush of power came over her, as she realized that now, nobody would be able to bully her. She felt like she was strong enough to do anything.

Olivia wasn't sure what it all meant, or if there were side effects, or most importantly, how and why the change had occurred. Thankfully, however, she knew somebody who would. Within a few moments she rushed naked out of her room (her old clothes would barely fit her anyway) and made for Rachel's room. There, what Olivia saw made her gasp in shock.

Rachel had been transformed as well. While Olivia had changed into a super-muscled preteen, Rachel had changed into a massive Amazonian goddess. Her muscles were the single most glorious thing Olivia had ever seen. inhumanly large and strong. Despite this Rachel too had retained her feminine side, with her body having grown and changed to keep perfect proportions. Through Rachel's now-torn dress, Olivia could see a figure that any girl would die for. Her muscles were indeed massive, but for example, her breasts looked a little more developed as well.

"Wow you look awesome" was all Olivia could say.
Rachel looked at her sister. "You too, huh? Guess that confirms my hypothesis."
She wrote down a little note in a heart-shaped pad while Olivia looked at her curiously. "Huh?" asked Olivia.
"Remember how last night we were at the restaurant - you felt great afterwards, right?"
"Yeah"
"Well, I figured that wasn't normal, so I did a bit of experimenting. I vomited up some of the food and thought I'd check it out to see what was in it."
"Eww"
"Yeah, but it was worth it. I found some traces of a real strange compound that seemed to bind to some of the lactose ... I've never seen estrogen receptors bind to PDPs in that way before..."
"In English, please."
"The milk had something in it. I've still got to do some experiments to work out what exactly it is but I've managed to isolate a little."
"And uh ... what are the, ummm... properties of this something?"
"Well, I guess that should be obvious. Look at you and me. Something weird sure is happening inside our bodies, and I'm totally confident it was because of that milk."

"I really like it" said Olivia "I feel incredible."
"Yeah, me too" replied Rachel "And since I vomited out part of the milk, I'm gussing you're going to become even bigger than me. I probably just grew faster because I'm older."
"Think anyone else might have had some?"
"I doubt it" laughed Rachel "Milk must be by far the most unpopular item on the menu there. It's a wonder they still order it. Did you come in here to ask me for some clothes?"
"And some answers" replied Olivia.
"Sure, take anything you like" replied Rachel "I'm going to get back to my research, find out what is happening here. This could be a HUGE scientific breakthrough!"
"Yeah" said Olivia dryly, flexing an arm "literally"

As Olivia started rummaging through Rachel's clothes - which were tight on her new body but at least they fit somewhat - Rachel spoke up again. "So, you going to school today? Looking like that?"
Olivia chuckled "Are you THAT insecure about your clothing?"
Rachel scoffed "No way, just ... wouldn't your classmates and teachers think it's weird?"
"I don't know" said Olivia "Aren't you going to school?"
"I'd barely fit through the doorway" replied Rachel "Besides, with the attention this body would get, I'd never be able to focus on my studies. I think I might just win the school science fair if I work this out."
"I think it might be more like a Nobel prize" laughed Olivia.
"Well, you're welcome to crash here with me if you like" replied Rachel "I'll bet mom and dad will be ok with it if you ask them. Though, just be careful you don't make them faint with how you've changed. In the meantime, I have some research to do!"
1532.title: They grow overnight

choices: The sisters become a crime fighting duo
The sisters get revenge on some bullies from school
15322.content:
"Hey mom?" asked Olivia through the door her parents' bedroom door.
"What is it sweetie?"
"Promise not to freak out when I come through the door ok?"
"Of course sweetie, what's the matter?"

Olivia slowly opened the door and revealed her new body to her mother. Nicole had been folding clothes and, as Olivia entered, her expression changed from one of shock, to one of curiosity, to one of awe.

"Oh my..." she began "You..."
"I know! Pretty incredible, right?" replied Olivia, posing a few times for her mother.
"But... what? How?" stuttered Nicole.
"I'm not sure, but Rachel seems to have it all figured out. She changed as well, and thinks it has something to do with the milk we drank at the restaurant."
"Wow"
"Yeah, I feel so strong now!"
"Yeah, for a girl your age ... there's no humanly possible way you should have muscles that big. I'm so proud!"
Olivia smiled and hugged her mother, taking care not to hug too tightly with her new muscles.

"So mom, I was kinda thinking that maybe Rachel and I shouldn't go to school today. Just until Rachel has it all figured out."
"Of course dear, whatever you want. You're both well ahead on your studies anyway, and you look more than healthy to me. Healthier than you were before, in fact. Just make sure you ask your father as well."
"Thanks mom! You're the best!"

Olivia decided against going through the whole process of explanation again with her dad. Instead, she chose a different tack.
"Hey dad?" she called from outside the kitchen, where Josh was making breakfast "Can Rachel and I stay home today? We're feeling a bit strange and mom said it was ok."
"What, did that expensive restaurant give you food poisoning now t... I mean, uh, sure sweetie. If mummy's ok with it, then so am I!"
"Thanks dad!" she said merrily. She wanted to hug him too, but really didn't want to take the risk of explaining her changes twice. Not to mention the fact that Josh was often the more responsible one who would have reacted somewhat more strongly to her newly improved muscles.

Soon enough, Josh and Nicole carpooled to work, leaving Rachel and Olivia behind at home. Olivia would usually have been reading a book at a moment like this, but the whole event was far too exciting for her, so she stayed in Rachel's room. Still wearing half-ripped clothes from the previous night, Rachel was busy on her laptop, typing in all sorts of figures into some kind of spreadsheet.

"What are you doing?" asked Olivia.
"Setting this up for some data analysis. Since you're here, I figure you might as well help me conduct a few experiments."
Olivia perked up. "That sounds like fun!" she said "Does that mean I get to test out what this rad body can do?"
"Absolutely" replied Rachel "But first, there's a heap of other tests I want to run..."

For the next few hours, Olivia was Rachel's enthusiastic lab assistant, moving around beakers, sticking probes into strange liquids, measuring, weighing things, reading out numbers on strange dials on all the science equipment in Rachel's room. Occasionally Olivia would ask enthusiastically if Rachel was any closer to figuring out what was going on, and Rachel just ignored her, typing away at her screen before issuing another command.

"Alright, now time to investigate our bodies directly" said Rachel.
"Great!" exclaimed Olivia, before seeing Rachel approach with some glass plates "Uh ... what's that for?"
"For putting under the microscope" replied Rachel "I'm going to need a few skin cells from your cheek, one of your hairs, and a saliva sample."
Olivia pouted "What about the fun stuff?"
"Isn't this fun?" asked Rachel dumbfounded.
"Maybe for you" muttered Olivia, as she scratched her cheek a little on top of a plate.
As she did so, she noticed Rachel was doing the same. "For comparison" explained Rachel.
Olivia rolled her eyes and plucked out one of her hairs. As she did so she noticed her hair seemed a bit longer and silkier than it had been. Finally, she spat a little on the last plate, before handing them back to Rachel.

"Ok, time to do some analysis" said Rachel "I'm going to be staring into my microscope for a few hours recording what I see... you might want to grab a book or something."

Rachel wasn't kidding. She really did spend hours, staring into her microscope with incredible curiosity. Olivia, meanwhile, grew more and more impatient as the day wore on. She just had to know what was going on, how strong she was, and more intruigingly, how strong she was going to become. To pass the time, she read a fantasy adventure book, imagining herself as one of the heroes, battling gigantic dragons. Then, she made some lunch for Rachel and herself.

"Can we do the interesting stuff now?" asked Olivia while serving Rachel some sandwiches for lunch "I REALLY want to know how much I can lift."
Rachel rolled her eyes. "Alright, I suppose I've looked at everything else long enough"
Olivia cheered, as the two sisters munched down their lunch, Olivia in a particular hurry.

"So, do we want to go to the gym or..." began Olivia when they had both finished.
Rachel smiled. "I don't think we need to" she said, before opening one of her cupboards that Olivia had not seen inside for a while. Where Olivia had assumed there was just a stack of old bedsheets, was now a full weights set.
"Woah - where'd you get these!?" asked Olivia, looking around the weights like a child in a candy store.
"Weights are incredibly useful for scientific research" replied Rachel "You can use them for..."
"Yeah, actually, I don't care" interrupted Olivia, already taking the weights out of their storage and putting them in the room. Individually she found all of them, even the biggest ones, to be fairly light, which excited her. Less than a day ago even looking at these solid disks of heavy metal would have been incredibly imposing for the young girl.

"OK, so, let's start off with the easiest weight, and try a number of different exercises" said Rachel "I did a bit of research on this last night in case I had to experiment on myself, but with you it should be even easier. This way I can watch you and make sure there aren't any problems."
Finding a bar as well, she walked Olivia through the basics of how to perform moves like lifts and presses and other weight exercises. Olivia listened intently, making sure to remember everything.

"OK, are you ready?" asked Rachel "Let's go!"
Olivia roared into action, her gigantic muscles lifting the easier weights with absolutely no resistance.
"Very good - I'm going to add more weight at the end of each rotation you do ... let's just see how much you can handle..." commented Rachel, taking extensive notes.
Olivia kept going as Rachel added more and more weight. A few times Rachel told Olivia to take a break, but Olivia wasn't tired in the slightest, lifting the weights with ease for what seemed like hours.

After a while Olivia found that, as Rachel kept increasing the difficulty, she was in fact starting to become just a little worn out. Slowly, tiny little increment by tiny little increment, the pressure on the bar became more and more, before Olivia finally found herself really straining at long last.
"Keep going!" encouraged Rachel "You're doing great!"
Before long though, Olivia found herself actually having to rest between rotations, but she was really determined. She kept pushing and pushing herself until eventually, after one final deadlift, she collapsed on Rachel's bed, utterly exhausted.

"Urgh" she groaned "I can't... believe... I failed!"

Rachel chuckled and she finished writing some note, then sat down next to her on the bed.
"Sister, you just came really close to breaking a world record" she said reassuringly "And not a women's powerlifting record ... a MEN'S powerlifting record."
"What?" asked Olivia, suddenly impressed.
"Yeah" replied Rachel "I think you might officially be the strongest woman in the world! And don't forget, I'm still expecting your body to become even bigger and stronger. I'd estimate you've approximately quadrupled your net strength overnight, possibly even quintupled..."

Olivia laughed. "Me, the strongest woman in the world? No way!"
"What do you mean?" asked Rachel, confused "The data is quite clear..."
"I can't be the strongest woman in the world - that's pretty clearly YOU!" laughed Olivia "I mean, look at you! You're so huge!"
Rachel blushed "I don't know..." she said, looking away.
"Come on" insisted Olivia "Let's see how well you can do."

And so the experiment was repeated, this time with Rachel as the subject. Olivia was this time responsible for loading the weights, while Rachel told Olivia which ones to give her. Again, Olivia saw that Rachel had no trouble at all with the easier weights, but did start to struggle a little as they got heavier. More and more Rachel had to strain before eventually, she stopped.

"OK, add on that weight over there" said Rachel, almost breathlessly "If I lift that, then I'm unofficially the strongest human being in recorded world history."
With great anticipation, Olivia loaded the weight on to the bar, trembling at the sight of her super muscular sister's insane strength.
And sure enough ... very slowly and with a significant amount of effort, Rachel in fact lifted the weight proudly.

"OK, let's try a little more..." said Rachel "There's only one more weight left to add in my set. Let's see if I can lift that."
Olivia was positively salivating at how incredible Rachel's body was, and how her own body was apparently so close to it, despite its smaller appearance. After loading the weight, Rachel strained significantly, pushing with almost all her might, but eventually lifted it as well.

"That's got to be close to my limit though" said Rachel "Wow, I didn't realize I was this strong!"
"Yeah" said Olivia "Seriously, this is incredible!"
15322.title: Olivia stays at home with Rachel

choices: Olivia grows more overnight
Both sisters grow more overnight
153221.content:
"So, do you have your scientific data now, sis?" asked Olivia.
Rachel chuckled, stretching her body after her exercises "Yeah, I think that should be enough for now. Though I have a ton of analysis to do before I can come to any conclusions."
"Well, there's one thing I can conclude already" chuckled Olivia happily "We're definitely the strongest sisters ever!"
"You can say that again" replied Rachel, going back to her computer to input some of her notes.

"So, what do you want to do, now that we're practically superhuman?" asked Olivia.
"Well, I for one just want to study it" said Rachel, knowing full well what her reading-obsessed sister was about to suggest "It's too fascinating for me to resist."
"Come on!" replied Olivia "We'd be the greatest superheroes the world has ever known. Together with your brains, my heart, and our combined strength, we could be unstoppable!"
"Yeah ... I'm not really the outgoing, save-the-world type..." rebutted Rachel "Sorry, not interested."

Olivia pouted. "Come on, sis. We have all this amazing power now, you can't honestly be telling me you don't want to use it for good?"
"Yeah, but... what about my scientific experiments?"
"You could still do them! I promise, if you join forces with the Super Sisters, it won't take up much time at all."
Rachel looked away from her screen and towards her younger sister. "You really want to do this, huh?"
"Totally!" said Olivia excitedly "And besides, you could help develop cool gadgets for us to use, and all the other sciency things. I'll do the more dangerous work in the field if you want me to. I love reading about adventures, so actually going on them should be awesome! Especially if I can go with you."

Rachel thought carefully, before sighing. "Alright" she said "I'll do it for you."
Olivia cheered. "Yay! You're the best big sister ever! I'll work on some costumes."
Rachel rolled her eyes. "No, if we're going to do this seriously, we're going to need more than strength, science and heart. We're going to need something else."

Soon enough, Rachel squeezed her large, muscular body into the biggest outfit she could find around the house. Even so, it looked about 5 sizes too small for her, leaving plenty of muscular skin showing when she and Olivia left the house moments later.

"You ready to go for a run?" asked Rachel.
"Sure! Lead the way!" replied Olivia, excited.
Rachel began by jogging off down the street. All around her, car drivers were distracted, and home owners stared out of the windows at the beautiful, strong bodies of the two young girls jogging past, but both she and Olivia ignored them. Wanting to test herself, Rachel picked up her speed, running faster and faster, Olivia keeping up with ease alongside her. The two girls' jog turned rapidly into a run, and then into a sprint, dashing through the streets of the city, before Rachel suddenly stopped outside an old building that seemed to have some kind of Asian writing on its side.

"Impressive" said Rachel, checking her phone "Looks like we might both set some kind of speed world record as well."
"And I'm not even tired" lied Olivia, as she panted a little "Where are we?"
"One of my friends from school lives here" replied Rachel "It's a judo dojo. Her father is the head instructor. Nice guy, I texted him just before. He said he'd help train us."
Olivia looked at her older sister oddly "Why do we need this? We're already super strong super sisters, nobody can beat us!"

Rachel chuckled knowingly, and went inside. "Wait up!" called Olivia as she followed.

"So, you wish to form a super hero team?" asked the head instructor "Indeed, I have never seen such impressive bodies as yours, but it's not only about how strong you are, is it? It's also about how you use that strength."
"OK, I get it. Can I go home now?" asked Olivia. Rachel rolled her eyes.
The instructor smiled knowingly, however. "Would you like to try to fight me?" he asked.
Suddenly Olivia looked worried "What if you get hurt?" she asked.
"What if you get hurt?" asked the instructor.
"With a body like this!? No way!" laughed Olivia.
"I guess we shall see then" replied the instructor "My technique or your body. Let's find out who gets hurt."

Olivia smirked, before attempting to catch the instructor off-guard with a sudden punch. Not wanting to hurt him she aimed down towards his chest, striking with just a portion of her strength, but going as fast as she could. However, it seemed as though the instructor had some kind of sixth sense for her move. Anticipating perfectly, he moved out of the way and pulled her down, using the momentum of her own punch against her. In a moment, Olivia hit the floor hard, her giant muscles making a large dent in the floor. The impact caused such a shockwave that Rachel's hair blew back somewhat, and Olivia gave a short yelp of pain.

"One move" said the instructor "One move is all it can take for even the strongest person to be brought down. I'd say Rachel here is absolutely right. You should probably get some of my training."

Over the course of the next few hours, Rachel and Oliva worked with the instructor, learning a few basic moves and holds. He taught them how to disarm somebody holding a gun, and a few teamwork moves that Rachel and Olivia could do together. It was intensive, but both girls soaked all the knowledge up readily, eager to try out some of the moves later. Olivia seemed especially motivated, not wanting to be embarrassed if she was in fact to become a junior superhero. At every opportunity, she did everything she could to outshine her slightly bigger and stronger older sister, in a spirit of friendly competition. For her part, Rachel noticed the way her body seemed not just stronger, but more flexible and responsive too, as though things like her reaction speed and coordination seemed somehow affected. Mentally she made a note to remember to record that later.

It was early evening when the girls were finished. "I need to go to eat dinner with my family now" said the instructor "I hope that this training has been valuable to you both."
"Say hello to Fay for me!" replied Rachel, thinking of her classmate.
"I'm sorry for being so arrogant earlier" added Olivia.
"It doesn't matter now" said the instructor "What matters is that you learnt from it. Why don't we try to fight again, one more time?"
"You sure?" asked Olivia.
"Absolutely" said the instructor, shrugging.

Olivia smiled, waiting for the instructor to come at her. After a moment of frustration he did, and Olivia tried to catch him with the same move he had used against her. Once again though, the instructor was quick, picking up Olivia's legs as he went down using her strength, and sending her on to her back. What he hadn't counted on, however, was that immediately after Olivia went down, she recovered, and her enourmous legs kicked the instructor with full force. The instructor went flying across the room, somersaulting as he went, and landed on one knee on the far side of the room.

Rachel gasped. She felt like she was watching a real-life action movie.

Frustrated at being taken down again, Olivia jumped right back up and ran at superhuman speeds towards the instructor, who narrowly dodged out of the way. Olivia, too, barely managed to change direction fast enough to avoid going right through the wall on the other side of the room, running along the walls instead. The instructor ran after her, but it was clear that Olivia was much faster than he was, her leg muscles bulging with rock hard muscles as she went. She ran circles around the instructor, before closing in and trying to use her super powerful arms to choke him.

The instructor, however, somehow once again used that to trip her and take her down to the ground. A few moments later, it was him that was on top of her, trying to choke her. However, he couldn't press hard enough against Olivia's neck muscles, so his choke was relatively ineffective. In a flash, Olivia tossed him off her, sending him flying a short distance and landing awkwardly on the ground. Then, she rushed him, delivering a punch perfectly positioned on his face.

Except she stopped about an inch in front of it. "I guess I win?" smiled Olivia.
"Alright" breathed the instructor heavily "You are a good student. Your technique is still a little off but I'm sure your strength more than makes up for it. I am impressed with how much you have improved in just one day. Besides, honestly, you two girls have the most incredible bodies I've ever seen! How did you get so strong?"
"It's a secret" said Rachel quickly, before the judo instructor asked too many questions "I think our parents will be home soon too. We'd better get going."
"You're welcome back at any time" said the instructor kindly.

Despite having exercised for most of the day, both Rachel and Olivia had no trouble sprinting the whole way back home. "I guess our endurance is pretty good too, huh?" asked Olivia as she arrived back at the home.
"Good" said Rachel "Because you promised I'd still have some time for some research, so I really need to get back to study. This school science fair report isn't going to write itself you know."
"Yeah. And then tonight we're going to fight crime right?"
Rachel laughed. "Well, this super sister hasn't slept in two days. I think I've got to get some sleep."
Olivia pouted. "Fine" she sighed.
153221.title: The sisters become a crime fighting duo

info.brief_description: Tainted milk is distributed and sold. Anyone who drinks it will experience muscle growth.
info.description:
This interactive story is dedicated to all those who love muscle growth stories and it is also created for all those who contributed to the old MegaMilk story, which has now been deleted since the creator of that story has deleted his profile from writing.com.

UPDATE:
The original author has returned to writing.com and he has restored the MegaMilk story, located here:

http://www.writing.com/main/interact/item_id/1779714-MegaMilk

Tainted milk had been accidentally packaged and sold in a carton from a dairy farm in southern Georgia where it was delivered by truck to a distribution plant in Atlanta. From there, the tainted gallon of milk was sold in a grocery store. It could have also ended up in a school or restaurant.

Anyone who drinks the milk will experience amazing and permanent muscular growth. This applies to men and women, boys and girls of all ages.

So, where does the gallon of milk end up and who gets to drink it? What happens? Who grows and how big do they become?

Story addition rules:
Please no sex, no vore, and no killing, violence or death scenes or descriptions in any new chapters allowed.
No one-line chapters allowed.
Stories with proper grammar and punctuation with over 300 words will be rewarded with gift points as deemed acceptable by the story owner.

This is supposed to be a fun muscle growth story. Please keep it that way.

Have fun!

-Rex (scriptboy)
